Package gw.api.webservice.systemTools

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServerStateInfo  
    ISystemTools  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBConsistencyCheckResult
    Class containing information resulting from the running of database consistency checks.
    QueryStoreRuntimeStatsIntervalDTO  
    ServerStateInfo
    Provides server state information which includes the server run level code, run level name, run level ordinal, serverid and startup exception
    ServerStateInfoImpl  
    ServerVersion
    Server version information.
    SessionData
    Returns session information for a server session.
    SystemRunlevel
    Defines the runlevels that the system can be at or set to.
    SystemToolsImpl  
    UpdateTableStatisticsData
    Contains the set of SQL that can be applied to update database statistics for the given table.
